title: MS Dhoni Gears Up for IPL 2025
content: CSK captain MS Dhoni has started intense training sessions ahead of IPL 2025. Fans are excited to see him back in action.

title: Ruturaj Gaikwad Named CSK Vice-Captain
content: Young opener Ruturaj Gaikwad has been appointed as CSK's vice-captain for the upcoming IPL season, showing the team's trust in him.

title: CSK vs MI: The Ultimate Rivalry Returns!
content: CSK will take on Mumbai Indians in the first high-voltage clash of IPL 2025. Fans can't wait for this classic showdown.

title: CSK Squad Announced for IPL 2025
content: Chennai Super Kings have officially announced their squad for IPL 2025, with key players like MS Dhoni, Jadeja, and Deepak Chahar leading the pack.

title: Ravindra Jadeja Set to Lead Spin Attack
content: All-rounder Ravindra Jadeja will be CSK's primary spin bowler this season, aiming to dominate on slow pitches.
